slogan: From shadow to light, discover your ideal vehicle
readOur: Read our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use
privacyPolicyContent: At Lumina Auto, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting it through our compliance with this policy. This policy describes the types of information we may collect from you or that you may provide when you use the Lumina Auto application and our practices for collecting, using, maintaining, protecting, and disclosing that information.
tapToAccept: Tap "Agree and Continue" to accept our

Include your area code if you haven't.

usernameLengthError: A username length should be between 3 and 40 characters.

orderErrorSnackbar: Error placing order. Please try again.
confirmDeleteCarMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this vehicle? This action is irreversible
aboutContent: Lumina Auto is a platform that provides a convenient and efficient way to buy or sell cars. Whether you are a buyer or a seller, Lumina Auto offers an inclusive marketplace to quickly find car deals without unnecessary hassle. Connect with sellers, explore a wide range of options, and make your next car purchase or sale with ease.
featureComingSoonMessage: This feature is not yet available. Our developers are actively working on developing it. We apologize for the inconvenience. For any inquiries, please contact the Lumina team via the messaging option.
